strings: <voice_0x01001281><se_low>Dominico: I must apologise if I worried you.
<voice_0x01001282><se_low>Dominico: It hit me the moment I saw poor David's body. Now everything is clear.
<voice_0x01001283><se_low>Dominico: It appears I was put on this world as part of a grander design, to fulfil my family's destiny.

<voice_0x01001284><se_low>Dominico: That is, protecting the heir of one of the
great sages. Protecting David.
This has always been my duty.

<voice_0x01001285><se_low>Dominico: But somewhere along the way my ancestors
let the power go to their heads.
We lost sight of our true purpose.

<voice_0x01001286><se_low>Dominico: ...If only I'd realised all this sooner,
I could have prevented this tragedy.
<voice_0x01001287><se_low>Dominico: I ordered my servants to bury David as the heir to a great sage should be buried, but...
<voice_0x01001289><se_low>Dominico: ...Nothing can put right the wrong I have done! I am not fit to show my face in public...
<voice_0x0100128A><se_low>Dominico: Will you do me one last favour?

<voice_0x0100128B><se_low>Dominico: Please don't deny me.
This is something I cannot do myself.
Please hear my request.
<voice_0x0100128C><se_low>Dominico: I know it was my Leopold who ended David's life. It pains me to have to ask you, but...

<voice_0x0100128D><se_low>Dominico: Will you destroy him for me?
Will you avenge the spilt blood of the sages?

<voice_0x0100128E><se_low>Dominico: That creature isn't my Leopold any more.
He's being controlled by some evil magic.

<voice_0x0100128F><se_low>Dominico: I know this won't make amends for my
unforgivable ignorance, but it's all I can
do now...

<voice_0x01001290><se_low>Dominico: And I owe you something too.
For all the trouble I have caused you...
<voice_0x01001291><se_low>Dominico: Ah, yes...
<voice_0x01001292><se_low>Dominico: I see that the girl has yet to unlock her true potential as a magician.

<voice_0x01001293><se_low>Dominico: Allow me to awaken the dormant powers
within you!
Jessica learns Kasizzle!
Jessica learns Kacrackle!
<voice_0x01001294><se_low>Dominico: People say they saw Leopold heading north out of town. That's where you should start looking.

<voice_0x01001295><se_low>Dominico: I'm sorry to have to ask this of you.
I wish you the best of luck!
